name: Apostle 3D (Assisted_Anarky)
description:
Apostle 3D is a throwback to retro shooters of the 90s, Fight your way through the dead, demons , religious fanatics and time to take revenge on those who took your life. Stop the demonic invasion and rest in peace. Expect to play through 20 levels with 10 different weapons to destroy your enemies. Scour the levels to find all the secrets in game.
Game includes: 20 Levels, 4 bosses, 7 weapons, unique pixel art graphics and an original soundtrack made for the game!
